QuestData.Title: Skimming Off the Top
QuestData.Description: That flying machine is our ticket out of here but its fuel tank is bone dry!$b$bWe're right next to the oil fields but with the infected out there we don't have time to run a line up here so we need to improvise.$b$bThe oil creatures moving next to the pumps out there are full of a highly potent mixture that I can drop right into the tank. Grab some of that oil for me and we'll be one step closer to getting out of here.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do ya have that oil for me yet?
QuestData.RewardText: Yea that's the stuff!$b$bNow I just need to connect the spark plugs and patch up a few holes and it'll be nearly in working order!
